```{r}
library(gapminder)
```

# Exercise 1.1
```{r}
gapminder %>%
  filter(country == "Canada" | 
         country == "New Zealand" | 
         country == "United States") %>%
  filter(year >= "1970" &
           year <= "1979")
```

#Exercise 1.2
```{r}
gapminder %>%
  filter(country == "Canada" | 
         country == "New Zealand" | 
         country == "United States") %>%
  filter(year >= "1970" &
           year <= "1979") %>%
  select(country, gdpPercap)
```

#Exercise 1.4
```{r}
gapminder %>%
  group_by(country) %>%
  filter(gdpPercap == max(gdpPercap))
```


#Exercise 1.5
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(scales)
```

```{r}
ggplot(gapminder, aes(lifeExp, gdpPercap)) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.1) +
  scale_y_log10("GDP per Capita")
```
